English.Text: Thanks to Richardson's log, you know that the Santíssima Vitória crashed on the east coast of Crown Falls. Her Majesty is certain the eagle section of the Sceptre sank with her, but where exactly? There are many such wrecks along those cliffs. Luckily there may be a clue— Nadasky was so struck by his first sight of the Santíssima Vitória that he sketched it in his journal.
